short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have to close browser or restart computer? Save all open tabs by one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A very simple and light weight tab manager. 
Sometimes we have to close the browser or restart the computer, but we are not done with the open web pages yet. This extension provides a quick solution to save/reload all open tabs by one click.

*** Important Point ***
To save the open tabs, this extension triggers permission warning. It does NOT collect any data. All data is saved in your browser.


We love getting feedback or suggestion from you!
